scripts.test:debug: export DEBUG=Y && export HEADLESS=N && npx wdio config/wdio.test.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpressions'@demo'
scripts.test:demo: export DEBUG=N && export HEADLESS=N && npx wdio config/wdio.test.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpressions'@demo'
scripts.test:smoke: export DEBUG=N && export HEADLESS=Y && npx config/wdio.test.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpressions'@smoke'
scripts.uat:demo: export DEBUG=N && export HEADLESS=N && npx wdio config/wdio.uat.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpressions'@demo'
scripts.uat:smoke: export DEBUG=N && export HEADLESS=Y && npx config/wdio.uat.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpressions'@smoke'
